conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D.

Liquid from A will be directed by the black baffle towards container E.
Liquid from B will be directed by the white baffle towards container F.
Liquid from C will be directed by the yellow baffle towards container F.
Liquid from D will be directed by the gray baffle towards container G.
